arts.ttl: Serie A | Lecce 0-4 Inter: Match Report
arts.sum: Inter Milan continued their impressive away form with a commanding 4-0 victory over Lecce, marking their seventh consecutive win on the road. The Nerazzurri showcased their depth and attacking prowess, with goals from Davide Frattesi, Lautaro Martinez, Denzel Dumfries, and Mehdi Taremi's Serie A debut strike. arts.ttl: How Man Utd would line up with Patrick Dorgu
arts.sum: Harry Maguire has established himself as a key player under Amorim, while Lisandro Martinez has been favoured at left centre-back. Below, FootballTransfers runs through how Dorgu could fit in at Old Trafford if Man Utd are able to reach an agreement to sign the Lecce star.
